title: Creating Your Own Blog
author: reikamoon
desc: Step-by-Step How I Created This Blog.
body:
Blogs are a great way to express creative freedom! 
 I made this blog using only React for the front end, node.js for the back-end, and postgresSQL as the database.

title: My Favorite Flowers
author: reikamoon
body: I love camellias, sakura, and peonies.

title: Who is Reikamoon?
author: reikamoon
body: My name is Reika! I am a CS student with a concentration in back-end web.
